org.xbmc.httpapi.client

Class InfoClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xbmc.httpapi.client.InfoClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IClient, IInfoClient

    public class InfoClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements IInfoClient
    The InfoClient basically takes care of everything else not covered by the other clients (music, video and control). That means its tasks are bound to system related stuff like directory listing and so on.
    Author:
    Team XBMC
